Key Match Events: Evan Mobley recorded a double-double with 34 points and 10 rebounds
The Cavaliers used a 20-point run to go from a 21-17 deficit to a 37-21 lead
The Cavaliers outscored the Mavericks 18-0 in first-half turnover points
LeVert got a friendly bounce on a left-corner 3 with four seconds left, to lead 69-53 at halftime
Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks played without both of their All-Star guards, Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving
The Mavericks have lost four straight to match a season-long losing streak
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers improved to 30-4 and are now 10-0 against the West
The Cavaliers have won nine games in a row with all wins being by double digits
Miscellaneous Highlights: Caris LeVert scored 17 off the bench
Quentin Grimes scored 26 points, 20 in the third period
Jaden Hardy added 17 off the bench
Klay Thompson scored 16, all in the first half
